short_description: ultimutt inn is a pet boarding & sitting services company based in burton, ohio, united states.
long_description: the ultimutt inn is a very special, home-like canine enrichment facility and pet resort. we provide unique experiences for dogs to help them build confidence, learn life skills and just have fun. we help every guest live their "ulitmutt life!". we tailor every day to meet each dog's needs, focusing on enrichment, whether it is for fun, exercise or socialization. we take each dog's age, breed, play style, energy level, physical shape and personality into consideration when planning activities. we offer indoor and expansive outdoor play yards that feature enrichment-based play obstacles and equipment including natural logs, tunnels, digging pits, sensory activity boards, mazes and more. we are privately owned and owner operated. we believe that creating a stress-free, social, home-like environment depends on a dog's familiarity with our staff, facility, and our daily routines.
